name:
Adventure in Vegas
Slot Machine
description:
Try your luck playing on three slot
machines: Hawaii, Treasure and Hot.
The one-armed bandits in "Adventure
in Vegas: Slot Machine" are not only
uniquely themed, but also have
different special table features: the
number of reels, extra buttons and
winning sequences. End your
around-the-world trip and risk the
remainder of a small fortune and
luxury possessions. All you can do in
Las Vegas is go for it!
